fields.name: Ficus Bonsai Tree
fields.description: The ficus bonsai tree is known for its easy maintenance and strong, flexible branches. With its glossy leaves and diverse shaping options, it's a popular choice for bonsai enthusiasts.

fields.name: Juniper Bonsai Tree
fields.description: A classic bonsai tree, the juniper is perfect for beginners. With its vibrant green foliage and unique shaping, it's sure to be a statement piece in any home or garden.

fields.name: Chinese Elm Bonsai Tree
fields.description: The Chinese elm bonsai tree is a versatile and hardy species, perfect for beginners and experts alike. With its small, dark green leaves and graceful shaping, it's a true bonsai classic.

fields.name: Japanese Maple Bonsai Tree
fields.description: The Japanese maple bonsai tree is a stunning addition to any collection. With its delicate, lacy leaves and elegant shaping, it's sure to impress. Requires a bit more maintenance than some other species.

fields.name: Sago Palm Bonsai Tree
fields.description: The sago palm bonsai tree is a unique addition to any collection. With its thick, palm-like fronds and interesting shaping, it's sure to stand out. Requires a bit more maintenance than some other species.

fields.name: Dwarf Jade Bonsai Tree
fields.description: A small, hardy jade tree trained and shaped to create a classic bonsai specimen.
